dcterms:creator: Bellemare M. G.
Naddaf Y.
Veness J.
Bowling M.
dcterms:description: A suite of Atari 2600 games used for evaluating reinforcement learning algorithms. The games are played directly from pixel inputs, and the agents must learn to perform actions based on visual observations.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)

dcterms:creator: Todorov E.
Erez T.
Tassa Y.
dcterms:description: A physics engine used for simulating robotic environments. The Humanoid Locomotion task involves training an agent to walk in a simulated environment, evaluating the agent's ability to learn and adapt to continuous control tasks.
dcterms:title: MuJoCo Humanoid Locomotion
